SEARCH

Class Blackjack

java.lang.Object
Games
Blackjack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class Blackjack extends Games
Blackjack extends Games, simulating blackjack. It manages the deck, player hands, dealer's hand, and the overall game logic like dealing, betting, and calculating winners.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class Games

    players, scanner

    Blackjack(ArrayList<Player> players)
    Constructs a new Blackjack game with the specified list of players Initializes the deck and sets up empty maps and lists for player and dealer hands.

    • Blackjack

      public Blackjack(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Constructs a new Blackjack game with the specified list of players Initializes the deck and sets up empty maps and lists for player and dealer hands.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players playing.

  • Method Details

    • dealInitialCards

      public void dealInitialCards()
      Deals first two cards to each player and to the dealer at the start of the game.

    • doubleDown

      public Card doubleDown(List<Card> currentHand, Player player)
      Allows a player to double their bet and receive exactly one additional card.
      Parameters:
      currentHand - The hand that the player wants to double down on
      player - The player who is doubling down
      Returns:
      The new card dealt to the player, or null player cant double down

    • split

      public int[] split(List<Card> currentHand, Player player)
      Allows a player to split their hand into two if the two cards are the same rank.
      Parameters:
      currentHand - The hand the player wants to split.
      player - The player attempting the split.
      Returns:
      An array of two integers indicating the value and suit of the card removed from the original hand, or null if the player cannot split.

    • printHand

      public void printHand(List<Card> hand)
      Calculates and prints the value of a hand
      Parameters:
      hand - The hand that's being calculated

    • getValue

      public int[] getValue(Card card, int value, int aceCount)
      Gets the value of the hand. alters it if the player has aces and is in danger of going over
      Parameters:
      card - The card to add to the hand's value
      value - Current total value of the hand
      aceCount - Number of aces in the hand
      Returns:
      An array with the new value and the new count of aces

    • dealerPlay

      public int dealerPlay()
      Executes the dealer's logic. The dealer will hit until their total reaches 17 or higher
      Returns:
      The final value of the dealer's hand.

    • calcWinner

      public void calcWinner(HashMap<Player,ArrayList<Integer>> endValues)
      Compares the final hand values of all players against the dealer to determine winners.
      Parameters:
      endValues - A map of each player and their hand values

    • play

      public void play()
      Does a full round of Blackjack. Takes bets, deals cards, allowing players to act, and calculating the winner
      Specified by:
      play in interface Game
      Specified by:
      play in class Games
